department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Department of National Defence, 5 CDSB Gagetown is looking to rent two (2) heavy equipment graders without operators.
description: The period of the contract is from April 01, 2024 to October 31, 2024 inclusive.
full_summary:
